description: Schema for gene data files used in the Alignment Map Viewer.

gene_name.description: The symbol or name of the gene.

knockout.description: Indicates if the gene is knocked out.

status.description: The current status of the gene (e.g., Active, Inactive).

expression_level.description: The measured expression level of the gene.

disorderTags.description: A list of associated genetic disorders.

brainRegionExpression.description: A map of brain regions to expression levels.
